summary: THE TIRES EXPERIENCED ABNORMAL WEAR OF THE REAR TIRES, CONSUMER WAS INFORMED AN ALIGNMENT WAS NEEDED.  *JB  THE ABNORMAL TIRE WEAR WAS ON ALL FOUR TIRE OUTER EDGES, OUT OF ALIGNMENT/ADJUSTMENT, FRONT ALIGNMENT WERE SET TO SPECIFICATIONS, HOWEVER, THE REAR AXLE TUBE ASSEMBLY WAS REPLACED ON THE REAR TO CORRECT THE PROBLEMS.  SCC
